title: Request a Campus Tour
description: A prospective student and their family want to schedule a campus tour.

tasks.description: Guide the user to the admissions website's tour scheduling page.
Explain the different tour options available (e.g., general campus tour, engineering department tour).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the available choices.

tasks.description: Assist the user in selecting a date and time and completing the registration form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the family successfully book their tour.
